column11: Note: Most orders are reconciled via Calculated (41.1%) and Invoice (30.8%), while Daily (4.0%) and API (7.2%) are the least used methods.

Key Finding:                                                                                                                      Most orders (over 70%) are reconciled using either Calculated (41.1%) or Invoice (30.8%) methods, indicating reliance on structured, post-shipping data for weight reconciliation.
In contrast, API-based reconciliation (7.2%) and Daily files (4.0%) are minimally used, suggesting low automation and potential for real-time weight tracking improvement.
